basic_scanner.name: Basic Scanner
basic_scanner.description: A simple gathering tool. Detect common items.

advanced_scanner.name: Advanced Scanner
advanced_scanner.description: Enhanced detection range. Find rare items more often.

quantum_scanner.name: Quantum Scanner
quantum_scanner.description: Top-tier technology. Epic and Legendary catches guaranteed.

basic_net.name: Basic Net
basic_net.description: Standard gathering net. Increases yield slightly.

reinforced_net.name: Reinforced Net
reinforced_net.description: Durable mesh. Catch multiple items per gather.

luck_charm.name: Luck Charm
luck_charm.description: Increases rare item drop rate by 20% for 30 minutes.

companion_treat.name: Companion Treat
companion_treat.description: Restores 50 hunger and 25 happiness to a companion.

xp_booster.name: XP Booster
xp_booster.description: Doubles companion XP gain for 2 hours.

master_key.name: Master Key
master_key.description: Unlock premium features for 7 days without subscription.

data_fragment.name: Data Fragment
data_fragment.description: Common digital debris. Used for crafting.

corrupted_file.name: Corrupted File
corrupted_file.description: Strange anomaly. Collectors pay well for these.

encryption_key.name: Encryption Key
encryption_key.description: Valuable security artifact. Highly sought after.

singularity_shard.name: Singularity Shard
singularity_shard.description: Mythic artifact from the AI singularity. 1 in 10,000 chance.

neural_chip.name: Neural Chip
neural_chip.description: AI learning module. Feed to companions for skill boosts.

hologram_badge.name: Hologram Badge
hologram_badge.description: Flashy cosmetic token. Show off in your vault.

ancient_code.name: Ancient Code
ancient_code.description: Legacy software from the pre-AI era. Museum worthy.
